messages.subject: unschooling campouts/conferences
messages.msgSnippet: I m in No. Colo. and we have a sweet, little, new unschooling group going, and I would like to reach people farther away for fun filled campouts! Well put
messages.messageBody:
I'm in No. Colo. and we have a sweet, little, new unschooling group going, and I
would like to reach people farther away for fun filled campouts!

Well put Pensacola on your calender for 2005 then!!
I'm hosting the Unschoolers beach party in early October 2005...not a conference, just a fun hangout with cool activities to choose from. Everyone is welcome to present a funshop and I will plan low/no cost tourist activities for people to choose from.
The hotel will be right on the beach, so we'll have miles of sugar white sand and warm water for swimming. Hopefully the dolphins will be present for all of you...they make appearances now and then.
I hope some of you will be here, we have quite a few unschooling families living down this way.

Ren


"I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn."
Albert Einstein
